TopicTitle: Moving parts like hinges in stock KSP

Articles.Content: I know there are mods that add moving parts to the game but I and I assume quite a lot of people mostly play vanilla (at least at first). This game could use hinges and other moving parts as standard to let's say make a rover that would normally be so big it would be a problem to the structure to launch it especially with the new aerodynamics. It would benefit the game immensly.

As pointed out, there's a thread on this very topic. It's a fine idea but I'm going to go ahead and close this one to keep the discussion in one place.

Cheers,

~Claw
